attributes.action: do not let the white british become the minority
attributes.additional_details: Recently released figures show 67% of students in london are from ethnic minorities and other cities are close behind, making white british students the minority in there own country. We want government intervention to bring this figure down to 55% or less, as well as policies to review ways of preserving the british way of life. Also immediate action on the deportation of all illegal immigrants and a lower cap on immigration. The british public public have been feeling the adverse effects of over immigration for some time now  and something needs to be done.
